description: The Straits Times follows Singapore Airlines flight attendant hopefuls on their 14-week journey to learn the ropes and earn their wings.
title: Creating an icon: What it takes to become SIA cabin crew
title_page: Creating an icon: What it takes to become SIA cabin crew | The Straits Times
